languages.text: {n}Застывшая корка из крови и иных телесных жидкостей покрывает тело человека, но глаза его открыты, а взгляд цепок. В этом взгляде, обращенном к вам, нет ни удивления, ни почтения.{/n} "Кто ты, потревоживш{mf|ий|ая} святых мучеников в обители нашей скорби? Что тебе надо?"

{n}A crust of congealed blood and other bodily fluids covers the man's entire body, but his eyes are open and his gaze is keen. This gaze is turned to you, devoid of surprise or deference.{/n} "Who are you, disturbing the peace of holy martyrs in the home of our grief? What do you want?"
languages.original_text: {n}Застывшая корка из крови и иных телесных жидкостей покрывает тело человека, но глаза его открыты, а взгляд цепок. В этом взгляде, обращенном к вам, нет ни удивления, ни почтения.{/n} "Кто ты, потревоживш{mf|ий|ая} святых мучеников в обители нашей скорби? Что тебе надо?"

traits.locale_text: {n}A crust of congealed blood and other bodily fluids covers the man's entire body, but his eyes are open and his gaze is keen. This gaze is turned to you, and it is devoid of surprise or deference.{/n} "Who are you, one who has disturbed the peace of the holy martyrs in the home of our grief? What do you want?"

{n}A crust of congealed blood and other bodily fluids covers the man's entire body, but his eyes are open and his gaze is keen. This gaze is turned to you, and it is devoid of surprise or deference.{/n} "Who are you, one who has disturbed the peace of the holy martyrs in the home of our grief? What do you want?"

{n}A crust of congealed blood and other bodily fluids covers the man's entire body, but his eyes are open and his gaze is keen. This gaze is turned to you, devoid of surprise or deference.{/n} "Who are you, disturbing the peace of holy martyrs in the home of our grief? What do you want?"

{n}A crust of congealed blood and other bodily fluids covers the man's entire body, but his eyes are open and his gaze is keen. This gaze is turned to you, devoid of surprise or deference.{/n} "Who are you, disturbing the peace of holy martyrs in the home of our grief? What do you want?"

{n}A crust of congealed blood and other bodily fluids covers the man's entire body, but his eyes are open and his gaze is keen. This gaze is turned to you, devoid of surprise or deference.{/n} "Who are you, disturbing the peace of holy martyrs in the home of our grief? What do you want?"

{n}A crust of congealed blood and other bodily fluids covers the man's entire body, but his eyes are open and his gaze is keen. This gaze is turned to you, devoid of surprise or deference.{/n} "Who are you, disturbing the peace of holy martyrs in the home of our grief? What do you want?"

languages.text: {n}这个男人的身体上覆满了凝固的血液与结痂的体液，但他的双眼是睁开的，目光非常锐利。他把目光转向你，眼神中没有任何惊讶或敬畏。{/n}“你是谁？竟敢在我们的圣所打扰神圣殉道者的安宁？你想干什么？”
languages.original_text: {n}A crust of congealed blood and other bodily fluids covers the man's entire body, but his eyes are open and his gaze is keen. This gaze is turned to you, devoid of surprise or deference.{/n} "Who are you, disturbing the peace of holy martyrs in the home of our grief? What do you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个男人的身体上覆满了凝固的血液与结痂的体液，但他的双眼是睁开的，目光非常锐利。他把目光转向你，眼神中没有任何惊讶或敬畏。{/n}“你是谁？竟敢在我们的圣所打扰神圣殉道者的安宁？你想干什么？”

languages.text: {n}Una costra de sangre y otros fluidos corporales resecos cubre el cuerpo del hombre en su totalidad, pero sus ojos están abiertos y su mirada es aguda. Te contempla sin sorpresa ni deferencia alguna.{/n} «¿Quién viene a perturbar la paz de unos santos mártires en el hogar de su pesar? ¿Qué busca?».
languages.original_text: {n}A crust of congealed blood and other bodily fluids covers the man's entire body, but his eyes are open and his gaze is keen. This gaze is turned to you, devoid of surprise or deference.{/n} "Who are you, disturbing the peace of holy martyrs in the home of our grief? What do you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una costra de sangre y otros fluidos corporales resecos cubre el cuerpo del hombre en su totalidad, pero sus ojos están abiertos y su mirada es aguda. Te contempla sin sorpresa ni deferencia alguna.{/n} «¿Quién viene a perturbar la paz de unos santos mártires en el hogar de su pesar? ¿Qué busca?».

languages.text: {n}血が固まったものや他の体液でできたカサブタが男の体中を覆っている。しかし男の目は開き、鋭い目つきをしていた。こちらに向いたその視線に、驚きや敬意の色は全く見られない。{/n}「我々の悲しみの住処で、聖なる殉教者の平穏を乱すとは何者だ？何が望みだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}A crust of congealed blood and other bodily fluids covers the man's entire body, but his eyes are open and his gaze is keen. This gaze is turned to you, devoid of surprise or deference.{/n} "Who are you, disturbing the peace of holy martyrs in the home of our grief? What do you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}血が固まったものや他の体液でできたカサブタが男の体中を覆っている。しかし男の目は開き、鋭い目つきをしていた。こちらに向いたその視線に、驚きや敬意の色は全く見られない。{/n}「我々の悲しみの住処で、聖なる殉教者の平穏を乱すとは何者だ？何が望みだ？」

languages.text: {n}Eine Kruste aus geronnenem Blut und anderen Körperflüssigkeiten bedeckt den gesamten Körper des Mannes, aber seine Augen sind geöffnet, und sein Blick ist klar. Er sieht dich an, ohne jede Überraschung oder Hochachtung.{/n} "Wer seid Ihr, dass Ihr den Frieden heiliger Märtyrer in der Heimat unseres Schmerzes stört? Was wollt Ihr?"
languages.original_text: {n}A crust of congealed blood and other bodily fluids covers the man's entire body, but his eyes are open and his gaze is keen. This gaze is turned to you, devoid of surprise or deference.{/n} "Who are you, disturbing the peace of holy martyrs in the home of our grief? What do you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Kruste aus geronnenem Blut und anderen Körperflüssigkeiten bedeckt den gesamten Körper des Mannes, aber seine Augen sind geöffnet, und sein Blick ist klar. Er sieht dich an, ohne jede Überraschung oder Hochachtung.{/n} "Wer seid Ihr, dass Ihr den Frieden heiliger Märtyrer in der Heimat unseres Schmerzes stört? Was wollt Ihr?"

languages.text: {n}Son corps tout entier est recouvert d'une pellicule de sang coagulé et d'autres fluides corporels, mais ses yeux sont grands ouverts et son regard acéré, rivé sur vous, ne trahit pas le moindre signe de surprise ou de soumission.{/n} « Qui êtes-vous pour venir troubler la paix des saints martyrs jusque dans leur asile de chagrin ? Que voulez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: {n}A crust of congealed blood and other bodily fluids covers the man's entire body, but his eyes are open and his gaze is keen. This gaze is turned to you, devoid of surprise or deference.{/n} "Who are you, disturbing the peace of holy martyrs in the home of our grief? What do you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Son corps tout entier est recouvert d'une pellicule de sang coagulé et d'autres fluides corporels, mais ses yeux sont grands ouverts et son regard acéré, rivé sur vous, ne trahit pas le moindre signe de surprise ou de soumission.{/n} « Qui êtes-vous pour venir troubler la paix des saints martyrs jusque dans leur asile de chagrin ? Que voulez-vous ? »

languages.text: {n}Pıhtılaşmış kandan bir kabuk ve daha birçok vücut sıvısı, adamın tüm bedenini kaplamış. Keskin bakışlar attığı gözleri ise sonuna kadar açık. Şaşkınlık ya da itaatten eser bulunmayan bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Sen kimsin? Ne cüretle matem evimizde mukaddes şehitlerin huzurunu bozuyorsun? Ne istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: {n}A crust of congealed blood and other bodily fluids covers the man's entire body, but his eyes are open and his gaze is keen. This gaze is turned to you, devoid of surprise or deference.{/n} "Who are you, disturbing the peace of holy martyrs in the home of our grief? What do you want?"

Şaşkınlık ya da itaatten eser bulunmayan bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Sen kimsin? Ne cüretle matem evimizde mukaddes şehitlerin huzurunu bozuyorsun? Ne istiyorsun?"
